attributes.action: ask the BBC to reduce the subsidy paid by the UK to the Eurovision Song Contest organisers to the minimum required to maintain participation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK is one of the 'big four' in the contest as our funding (via the BBC) of the Eurovision Song Contest guarantees our inclusion in the final each year.  This petition suggests that the BBC should reduce its financial contribution significantly and give up its automatic right to entry into the final stage.  

The money could be better spent on programmes or perhaps even donated to charity, although this would very worthwhile, it would be problematical legally.

We would also be able to enjoy the competition more without the disappointment of coming last each year.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
